quote: Example is not the main thing in influencing other people; it’s the only thing
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Associate yourself with people of good quality, for it is better to be alone than in bad company
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Keep away author people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great
author: Mark Twain

quote: There is only one success
author: to be able to spend your life in your own way

quote: You don’t buy a nice car and get rich you get rich and buy a nice car
author: Unknown

quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: One day your life will flash before your eyes. Make sure it is worth watching
author: Mooie

quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, the mind can achieve
author: Dr. Napoleon Hill

quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work
author: Thomas Alva Edison

quote: If you ain’t making waves, you ain’t kickin’ hard enough
author: Unknown

quote: What is not started will never get finished
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will
author: Mahatma Gandhi

qoute: Try not to become a man of success but rather to become a man of value
author: Albert Einstein

qoute: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it
author: Confucius

qoute: Everything negative, pressure, challenges – is all an opportunity for me to rise
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: I am not afraid of storms for I am learning to sail my ship.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: It takes 20 years to build a reputation and five minutes to ruin it. If you think about that, you’ll do things differently.
author: Warren Buffet

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Life is ours to be spent, not to be saved.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: Tell me and I forget. Show me and I remember. Let me do and I understand.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning
author: Bill Gates

quote: You will regret someday if you don’t do your best now.
author: Jeon Jung-kook, BTS

quote: If you want to love others, I think you should love yourself first.
author: Kim Nam-joon (RM), BTS

quote: Impossible only means that you haven’t found the solution yet.
author: Anonymous

quote: Even if you’re not perfect, you’re limited edition.
author: Kim Nam-joon (RM), BTS

quote: You were born to be real, not to be perfect.
author: Min Yoon-gi (Suga), BTS

quote: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.
author: Warren Buffet

quote: It’s OK to have your eggs in one basket as long as you control what happens to that basket.
author: Elon Musk

quote: If you don’t find a way to make money while you sleep, you will work until you die.
author: Warren Buffet

quote: Kill them with success, burry them with a smile.
author: Kim Nam-joon (RM), BTS

quote: Everything is theoretically impossible, until it is done.
author: Robert A. Heinlein.

quote: Living without passion is like being dead.
author: Jeon Jung-kook, BTS

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: A sense of humor is part of the art of leadership, of getting along with people, of getting things done.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: The value of a man should be seen in what he gives and not in what he is able to receive.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Any woman who understands the problems of running a home will be nearer to understand the problems of running a country.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Face reality as it is, not as it was or as you wish it to be.
author: Jack Welch

quote: Know that the pain will pass. And when it does you will be stronger.
author: Park Ji-min, BTS

quote: Maybe I made a mistake yesterday, but yesterday’s me is still me. I am who I am today, with all my faults. Tomorrow I might be a tiny bit wiser, and that’s me, too. These faults and mistakes are what I am, making up the brightest stars in the constellation of my life.
author: Kim Nam-joon (RM), BTS

quote: The goal of a start-up is not to stay a start-up.
author: Bernard Arnault

quote: Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.
author: Elon Musk

quote: No matter who you are, where you’re from, your skin color, gender identity: Speak yourself.
author: Kim Namjoon (RM), BTS

quote: When things get hard, stop for awhile and look back and see how far you’ve come. Don’t forget how rewarding it is.
author: Kim Tae-hyung (V), BTS

quote: Team work makes the dream work.
author: John Maxwell

quote: If a cluttered desk is a sign of a cluttered mind, of what, then, is an empty desk a sign?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Our virtues and our failures are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: Never give up on a dream that you’ve been chasing almost your whole life.
author: Park Ji-min, BTS

quote: Everyone suffers in their life. There are many sad days. But rather than sad days, we hope to make better days. That’s what makes us live. That’s what makes us dream.
author: Kim Nam-joon (RM), BTS

quote: You’re too young to let the world break you.
author: Kim Tae-hyung (V), BTS

quote: I started the site when I was 19. I didn’t know much about business back then.
author: – Mark Zuckerberg

quote: I think a simple rule of business is, if you do the things that are easier first, then you can actually make a lot of progress.
author: – Mark Zuckerberg

quote: Be what you want to be, not what others want to see.
author: Park Ji-min, BTS

quote: Forget what hurt you, but never forget what it taught you.
author: Kim Tae-hyung (V), BTS

quote: SILENCE IS GOLDEN. DON’T WASTE TIME.
author: Park Ji-min, BTS

quote: You are the leader of your own life.
author: Jung Ho-seok (J-Hope), BTS

quote: When we don’t have a boyfriend or girlfriend, we always say, ‘Oh, I’m so lonely. I want a date,’ or something like that. But I think the biggest love we’re all searching for is the love for one’s self.
author: Kim Nam-joon (RM), BTS

quote: You never lose a dream. It just incubates as a hobby.
author: Larry Page

quote: The best investment you can make is in yourself.
author: Warren Buffet

quote: Life’s too short to hang out with people who aren’t resourceful.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Don’t compare yourself with anyone in this world…if you do so, you are insulting yourself.
author: Bill Gates

quote: THOSE WHO WANT TO LOOK MORE YOUTHFUL SHOULD LIVE LIFE WITH A YOUNG HEART.
author: Kim Seok-Jin, BTS

quote: Some people dream of success, while others wake up and work hard at it.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: Think of it as you want it, not as it is.
author: Larry Ellison

quote: To do meaningful work is to contribute – to create value in society.
author: Charles Koch

quote: DON’T GIVE UP ON YOURSELF. TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF AND TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR LIFE.
author: Park Ji-min, BTS

quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can’t lose
author: Bill Gates

quote: It’s fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
author: Bill Gates

quote: I HAVE COME TO LOVE MYSELF FOR WHO I AM, FOR WHO I WAS, AND FOR WHO I HOPE TO BECOME.
author: Kim Nam-joon (RM), BTS

quote: WHEN THINGS GET TOUGH, LOOK AT THE PEOPLE WHO LOVE YOU! YOU WILL GET ENERGY FROM THEM.
author: Jung Ho-seok (J-Hope), BTS

quote: You must be the change you want to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Arise, Awake and Stop not until the goal is reached
author: Swami Vivekananda.

quote: We are what our thoughts have made us; so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; they travel far
author: Swami Vivekananda.

quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. The mind is everything. What we think we become
author: Gautama Buddha.

quote: Don’t be trapped in someone else’s dream.
author: Kim Tae-hyung (V), BTS

quote: Go on your path, even if you live for a day.
author: BTS-(No-More Dream)

quote: In the middle of the road, in the moment you want to give up, shout out even louder: So What?
author: BTS-(So What)

quote: Who says a dream must be something grand? Just become anybody. We deserve a life. Whatever, big or small, you are you after all.
author: BTS-(Paradise)

quote: Like an echo in the forest. The day will come back around, as if nothing happened. Yeah, Life goes on.
author: BTS -(Life goes on)

quote: In the dark dawn, spreading trembling wings. Keep on shining make it brighter than a spotlight.
author: BTS-(Dream Glow)

quote: 90% of your worries are just an imaginary swamp that you created.
author: BTS-(So What)

quote: I'm a survivor,I'm not gonna give up,I'm not gonna stop,I'm gonna work harder.
author: Destiny's Child -(Survivor)

quote: The morning will come again. No darkness, no season is eternal.
author: BTS-(Spring Day)

quote: Follow your dream like breaker. Even if it breaks down, Don’t ever run backwards, never.Because the dawn right before the sun rises is the darkest.
author: BTS-(Tomorrow)

quote: Pain! you break me down, you build me up, believer
author: Imagine Dragons-(Believer)

quote: If you think you’re going to crash, step on the pedal harder. Never mind, never mind, Even if it’s a road of thorns, we still run.
author: BTS-(Never Mind)

quote: NO better you than the you are, NO better life than the life we're living,NO better time for your shine, you're a star.
author: Alessia Cara-(Scars to Your Beautiful)

quote: I still believe, even though it’s unbelievable: To lose your path,Is the way to find that path.
author: BTS-(Lost)

quote: If you can’t fly, then run. Today we will survive. If you can’t run, then walk. Today we will survive. If you can’t walk, then crawl.
author: BTS-(Not Today)

quote: I believe in myself; My back hurts in order to let my wings sprout.
author: BTS-(Wings)

quote: I worked all night, every day...While you were out clubbing.
author: BTS-(Dope)

quote: What is the you that you dreamed of? Who do you see in the mirror? I gotta say..Go on your path..Even if you live for a day..Do something..Put away your weakness.
author: BTS-(No More Dream)

quote: Who are you living for? My heart stopped when I was nine or ten. Put your hand on your heart and ask what your dream was, What it really was.
author: BTS-(O!RUL8,2?)

quote: Get up, stand up! Don’t give up the fight!
author: Bob Marley (Get Up Stand Up)

quote: Don't give up..You've got a reason to live ..Can't forget you only get ..what you give.
author: New Radicals-(You Get What You Give)

quote: And if at first your don't succeed, then dust yourself off and try again!
author: Aaliyah-(Try Again)

quote: In every life we have some trouble. But when you worry, you make it double.
author: Bobby McFerrin -(Don’t Worry be Happy)

quote: Work it, make it, do it, makes us: harder, better, faster, stronger
author: Daft Punk -(Harder, Better, Faster)

quote: You are Beautiful, no matter what they say.
author: Christina Aguilera-(Beautiful)

quote: Weather you think you can or you think you can't,you're probably right.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to switch on the light!
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: If someone is trying to bring you down, it only means you're above them.
author: Bella Thorne

quote: To focus on what we can do is the most powerful catalyst for growth.
author: Gaur Gopal Das

quote: Remember, the moment you accept total responsibility for everything in your life is the moment you claim the power to change anything in your life.
author: Hal Elrod, The Miracle Morning

quote: If we don’t change, we don’t grow. If we don’t grow, we aren’t really living.
author: Diwakar Singh

quote: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
author: Margaret Hungerford

quote: Life is what happens to you when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lenon

quote: Not knowing you can’t do something is sometimes all it takes to do it.
author: Ally Carter

quote: If something is important enough, even if the odds are against you, you should still do it.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, But the day after tomorrow will be sunshine
author: Jack Ma

quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: There is only one good, knowledge, and one evil, ignorance.
author: Socrates

quote: To find yourself, think for yourself.
author: Socrates

quote: Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel.
author: Socrates

quote: Beware the barrenness of a busy life.
author: Socrates

quote: The best way to predict free future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Dead people receive more flowers than the living ones because regret is stronger than gratitude.
author: Anne Frank

quote: This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can’t see how deep it is.
author: Dennis Rodman

quote: The common facts of today are the products of yesterday’s research.
author: Duncan MacDonald

quote: Anything that can go wrong will go wrong.
author: Murphy’s law

quote: Never make a permanent decision on temporary feelings.
author: Gautama, The Buddha

quote: Whatever anybody says or does, assume positive intent. You will be amazed at how your whole approach to a person or problem becomes very different. When you assume negative intent, you’re angry. If you take away that anger and assume positive intent, you will be amazed.
author: Indra Nooyi

quote: What I cannot create, I do not understand.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: Cogito, ergo sum.
author: René Descartes

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever
author: John Keats

quote: A bird doesn't sing because it has an answer, it sings because it has a song.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
author: Plato

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
author: Seneca

quote: It is not our abilities that make us who we are, it is our CHOICES.
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: AI will be the best or worst thing ever for humanity!
author: Elon Musk

quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistance is the vehicle you arive in.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: We’re here to put a dent in the universe. Otherwise why else even be here?
author: Steve Jobs

quote: People think focus means saying yes to the thing you've got to focus on. It means saying no to the hundred other good ideas that there are. You have to pick carefully.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: You can't just ask customers what they want and then try to give that to them. By the time you get it built, they'll want something new.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I'm convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the nonsuccessful ones is pure perseverance.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren’t used to an environment where excellence is expected.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: You can’t connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Earth provides enough to satisfy every man's need , but not every man's greed.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: One child , one teacher , one pen and one book can change the world.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: It is very easy to defeat someone , but very difficult to win someone.
author: APJ Abdul Kalam

quote: The average men consume. The wise create
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I think 99 times and find nothing. I stop thinking, swim in silence, and the truth comes to me.
author: Albert Einstein
